column4: Tourism;Svay Rieng: According to an official of the Provincial Department of Tourism
column5: Chi Hor Temple is the oldest temple in Svay Rieng Province.------It is located in the northeastert in Prey Kdei village
column9: about 58 kilometers away from the provincial town.------According to the source
column10: the temple was built during the 6th century (Sambor Prei Kuk style pattern) on a hill 3 meters high
column12: along the riverfront on the Cambodian-Vietnamese border. Doors
column14: walls and other carvings are all made of burnt clay.
